| Property Name |
| --- |
| self-organization (as a property of PQCDTB and PCZDTB) |
| FF (Frequency Factor) |
| PQ-controlled quartz crystal double-tuned bridge |
| Piezoelectric quartz crystal double-tuned bridge |

Explanation: Self-organization is a property or behavior exhibited by certain systems, and it is a property of both PQCDTB and PCZDTB in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| self-organization |

Note: In the original paragraph, "higher FF" refers to a material property, specifically the Flicker Factor, which is a value that characterizes the stability of a light source. Therefore, "FF" is considered a valid property value. However, "compared with" and "higher" are not property values and have been removed. Similarly, "Because of self-organization" is a sentence explaining the cause of the difference in FF between PQCDTB and PCZDTB, but it is not a property value.
